casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Repasz, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Repasz v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 135.]

(No. 96-2653 Submitted July 15, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) *136McCrory & Clark Co., L.P.A., Kurt M. Young and Christopher S. Clark, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Cordelia A. Glenn, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission. Overly Spiker Chappano & Wood, L.P.A., Douglas E. Spiker and Lev K. Martyniuk, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed. The Industrial Commission is ordered to pay wage-loss compensation benefits from May 15,1992.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
